products.title: Happy Healthy Gift Bundle
products.short_desc: we’ve put together a care package that includes snacks that are rich in antioxidants, vitamins etc.
products.description:
we’ve put together a care package that includes snacks that are rich in antioxidants, vitamins and minerals, many of which are known to be immune boosters, to keep your tickers healthy and your minds free and clear! 
happy healthy bundle includes: 
- 2 x heartystrong (contains brazil nuts which has high selenium and antioxidant properties) 
- 2 x omega booster (contains pumpkin seeds that has zinc and iron vital for immune functions & sunflower seeds for vitamin e and antioxidants) 
- 2 x macritchie midnight (contains hazelnuts which are rich in omega-6 and 9 fatty acids & dark chocolate for antioxidants) 
- free shipping

products.title: Mystery Grab Bag
products.short_desc: shop our insane mystery grab bag sale now! 5 sharing packs in total and as low as $2.6/pack
products.description:
shop our insane mystery grab bag sale now! 
5 sharing packs in total and as low as $2.6/pack (u.p $3.90) with guaranteed shiitake mushroom chips in the bag?!⁣ ⁣
what are you waiting for?⁣ ⁣
*do note that there may be nut mixes included*

products.title: Midnight Mystery Box
products.short_desc: sometimes a whole brownie is too indulgent and you just want a quick chocolatey fix.
products.description: sometimes a whole brownie is too indulgent and you just want a quick chocolatey fix. this bite-size low calorie snack will rock your socks without leaving you regretting certain life decisions.

products.title: Almond Longan Jelly
products.short_desc: all things crispy in a snack with pretzels, soya crisps and cashews to drop some umami notes.
products.description: all things crispy in a snack with pretzels, soya crisps and cashews to drop some umami notes.
